title: Social Innovation Entrepreneurship Education Design Based on Biology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biological Principles, Secondary Education Experience, and Awareness of Fundamental Entrepreneurship Concepts
context.additional_context: Entrepreneurship education focused on solving social issues using biological principles, conducted in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners derive at least three entrepreneurial ideas that solve real-life problems using biological principles (ecosystems, genetics, etc.).
Learners develop entrepreneurial prototypes following the CAPAB(L)E model (Characterizing-Analyzing-Prototyping-Assessing-Building-Exposing).
Learners design biology-based business models with social value and incorporate over 80% of peer-reviewed improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
